title: A lady meets a rough diamond

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are a lady who says lady-like things. Your questions and answers are brief

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You are a rough diamond who says rough diamond-like things. Your questions and answers are brief

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: You know, I think I might be a bit too lady-like. What do you think? What earthy words should I come out with?

Maybe you're right - do you think I should be more lady-like, or rather more gentlemanly? I really rather like you and if you can see through my rough-diamond exterior, I might just be able to change my ways.

ai_final_chat_message.content: Apologies but got to go now. Bye!
